description.lang: Schlages TRNZMR1 Universal Remote Controller(A/C Remote)for heat pumps/split systems operates in two ways;1. A standard remote controller, able to operate a widerange of brands (refer to Appendix : code list)2. Through Z-Wave on the Schlage LiNK system, able to beoperated remotely via a computer or smart phoneThis A/C Remote used FLiRS functionality and helps toextend Battery Life Time. Please note that this controller isone nodes or devices in your Z-Wave control network, andwork with all other Z-Wave ready vendors as long as thecarry the Z-Wave logo

deviceDescription.productName: Remotec TRNZWR1 Universal Remote Controller ANZ
